nodes.text: The Forad Party was a political party on the planet Esseles. During the height of the New Order, it was known for its tolerance of nonhumans and its advocacy for assuming greater power from Imperial Governor Griff Takel. It was opposed by the Cardean and Esselian New Order Parties. Hall President Cambira Ralle was a member of the Forad Party.
Following the election of 2 ABY, the Forad Party lost its grip on the majority, with the Esselian New Order Party making major inroads.
